product_title: 16-Ounce Coffee Flask with Flex Sip™ Lid
product_description: A 16-ounce coffee flask equipped with a flexible sip lid to prevent leaks is the perfect companion for the trail, the beach or everyday use.
product_details_and_care:
A 16-ounce coffee flask equipped with a flexible sip lid to prevent leaks is the perfect companion for the trail, the beach or everyday use. TempShield protection keeps all your beverages the perfect temperature, hot or cold.
3" x 8"
Holds 16 oz.
TempShield insulation
Keeps liquids hot for up to six hours and cold for up to 24 hours
Fits under most coffee brewing systems
BPA-free; phthalate-free
18/8 pro-grade stainless steel/polypropylene
Dishwasher safe
Imported
Item #6021302
